description: This is an HTML file implementing a web-based database viewer interface. It includes CSS styling for the UI layout, and JavaScript for dynamic behaviors such as fetching database list, tables, and data, as well as UI interactions like expanding data cells and refreshing the view.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar UI.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by re-fetching data and updating the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it in a tabular format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML for the data table from fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for an individual cell, handling different data types including objects and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content when truncated.
